plot: A man, Bernard Bovet, his memories, his family, his work as a herdsman and dairyman, his amateur films, his region and his love for people and the mountains.
title: Bernard Bovet le vieil homme à la caméra
plot_es: A man, Bernard Bovet, his memories, his family, his work as a herdsman and dairyman, his amateur films, his region and his love for people and the mountains.
